API Reference¶

Here all foehnix classes and functions will be listed.

Classes¶

Tools to set-up and run OGGM.

foehnix.foehnix.Foehnix Foehn Classification Based on a Two-Component Mixture Model
foehnix.families.Family Common logic for the foehnix families

Filter¶

foehnix.foehnix_filter.foehnix_filter Foehnix filter function

IWLS¶

foehnix.iwls_logit.iwls_logit Iterative weighted least squares solver for a logistic regression model.
